segments.text: Hey , Karen . Look like you got some sun this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ? I guess so . I spent the weekend at beach .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s great . Where did you stay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some friends of my parents live out there , and they invited me there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what did you do out there ? I mean besides bask in the sun , obviously .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I jogged up and down the beach and played volleyball . You know I never realized how hard it is to run on sand . I couldn ’ t get through a whole game before I had to sit down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not to mention cooler . Did you go swimming ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wanted to , but the water is too cold , and I just wetted in up to my knees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It all sounds so relaxing . I wish I could get away to the beach like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks like you could use it . Don ’ t tell me you spent the weekend in the library again .
segments.speaker: S2
